description: A React functional component named 'Dice' that displays a stylized dice with animation effects and a button to trigger a roll. The component manages the dice display, including visual effects during rolling, and handles user interaction for rolling the dice in a multiplayer Ludo game.

methods.name: Dice({ rolling, value, canRoll, onRoll, currentPlayer })
methods.description: React functional component that renders a stylized dice with animation effects based on props such as rolling state, current value, and user interaction.

ctags.name: Dice
ctags.pattern: /^export default function Dice({ rolling, value, canRoll, onRoll, currentPlayer }) {$/
